channel.title: My Few Update Gripes
channel.description:
Hello there!
I don't mean to make my first post such a Debby... So first off I'd really like to thank the devs for continuing to support this game in the effort to make it better! That said... I really think the new update has taken a step backward, as far as my interest in the game is concerned. I truly feel that some very amazing roles have been neutered, which really degrades the experience.
I believe removing the dead interactions entirely has drastically hurt the appeal of the game to me. It has simply neutered the phys and psy, whilst making the possessor a demi-god.
I also believe the princess change has made her far too weak and less interesting. She was one of my favorite classes, and while I like trying to encourage her to flirt more - the will-o was her only protection in working with the king/prince daily.
While I like how the evil king percentage has sort of killed the whisp meta... the other changes I could do without.
Thoughts?
-Praise the Sun Solaire

item.title: My Few Update Gripes
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
What about this:

Night Ability 2 - Wisp: Discover target’s player class type if they visit someone else. (2 uses)

Type meaning: Killer, Offensive, Support, Social, Special, Investigative.

Converts don’t count as visit, so they won’t be caught. It is strong, but so is Peek.

Alternatively:

Night Ability 2 - Wisp: Discover target’s player class type if they get visited by someone. (3 uses)

This requires teamwork for the BD and is a lot less stronger than the earlier one. Princess can discover an exact type and the information that someone visited the target, or only that noone visited their target.

Or possibly this,

Night Ability 2 - Wisp: Discover if target player has royal blood. (unlimited uses)

It should be some non-confirmable investigative ability.

item.title: My Few Update Gripes
item.dc:creator: Riley_Sinn
item.description:
Not sure I understand what the problem is with making her that confirmable. It’s pretty obvious who the drunk is based off of targets, a butler can easily poison, noble can force vote etc. If anything this makes the princess damn near impossible to outright confirm.

With the increased evil percentage, the old will-o would have made people think twice about will-o-whisping the king, as he could be evil… and giving an evil king the ability to easily confirm simultaneously BD and Unseen roles ought to make any clever princess consider not whisping so early or solely to the king.

I think all that needed to be done was to mess with the evil/good king percentages.
Also, while I agree that the NK ought to be powerful, the new possessor goes leaps and bounds beyond the intended reaper/sorc equivalents right now.

Read full topic

item.title: My Few Update Gripes
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
It has simply neutered the phys and psy, whilst making the possessor a demi-god.

Possessor is supposed to be a demi-god. If he dies he loses, he has no team.

I would like psychic to be able to talk to the dead again, however if that means bringing back the OP death knights and Possessor problem then I rather the dead interactions stay gone completely.

I also believe the princess change has made her far too weak and less interesting. She was one of my favorite classes, and while I like trying to encourage her to flirt more - the will-o was her only protection in working with the king/prince daily.

But it makes her too confirmable.

While we should look into a new power, I don’t think the old one is very good.

What if they classified every ability similar to how they do the classes and change the willowisp to an ability that helps you narrow down the ability type the target used that night? e.g. if a Knight uses cs it would say they used a kill/off ability, if he guards it would say sup/soc, if cult leader converts it would say spec/inv, etc Not sure how redundant that would be but it’s just a thought, I’m not good at coming up with class ideas
